review: The rooms were cosy enough. At a place of protected National Park, their hospitality & food was great. We had the time of our life at a dream desitnation. The hotel offers homely atmosphere and service 24x7 to the trekkers and pilgrims visiting Valley of Flowers & Hemkund Sahib.The food ranging from South Indian, Chinese, Garhwali, North Indian Cuisine and Lunch Pack offerred is awesome.
name: Parimal N
